title: 17-year-old shot in east Lee County
content:
A 17-year-old was injured in an east Lee County shooting Tuesday afternoon.
Dominic Salvatore was shot as he drove his blue Ford Taurus near State Road 82 and Rue Labeau Circle.
He drove his car to Fargo Drive and was found bloodied lying in a driveway near the intersection, according to a Lee County Sheriff's Office incident report. The driver's side windows were shattered and several bullets punctured the car's side.
Salvatore sustained at least one gunshot wound, according to the report. The passenger in his vehicle was uninjured. Salvatore was transported to Lee Memorial Hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Deputies and K-9 officers searched the roadside along State Road 82 for evidence.
Salvatore and the witness in the vehicle were not forthcoming with information, according to the report.
The investigation into the shooting continues.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers at 1-800-780-TIPS (8477). All callers will remain anonymous and will be eligible for a cash reward of up to $1,000. Tips may also be made online at www.southwestfloridacrimestoppers.com or by submitting a tip through the P3Tips app.
